metadata.title: CVE-2021-3148 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt before 3002.5. Sending crafted web requests to the Salt API can result in salt.utils.thin.gen_thin() command injection because of different handling of single versus double quotes. This is related to salt/utils/thin.py.

criterions.comment: salt package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
